body:
well guys this will be the end of the best server I've play in my whole life a really enjoy this community and the gaming over here but the end has come
love u all guys
we can keep in touch if you want tooo
im from mexico so if you wanna play other server like stratus ill be glad or even other games
 here are my social medias so you can msg me if you want to
snap - jorgedelabrena

facebook - https://www.facebook.com/witz.cordero
whatsapp +5240774233
sooo thats pretty much all guys love u avic.us and ill never forget u
 
this on is for you avicus   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aDCcLQto5BM (me rehuso)
